name: Delivery in Space
description:
Your goal is to successfully reach the planets to make deliveries.

You need to observe the best way to get to your destination using our card-based movement system to move the spaceship. Wormholes, nebulas and solar storms will not stop you on this journey!

Travel across the galaxy, admire the wonders of outer space and be careful not to be swallowed by a black hole!

Gameplay

Choose a card and then a direction to move the spaceship 🪐


Different types of movement 🚀
.....................................

Beware of the dangers of space 🕳

Features 🌌

  • More than 70 unique levels, with 7 differents planets
  • Various space obstacles to overcome
  • Card-based movement with different choices to move your ship
  • A challenge and relaxing experience
  • Mouse only
